Serialized Form

  • Package <Unnamed>

    • Class DimensionException extends java.lang.RuntimeException implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • message

          java.lang.String message
          Holds the exception message.

    • Class IterationException extends java.lang.RuntimeException implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • message

          java.lang.String message
          Holds the exception message.

    • Class LifeFrame extends javax.swing.JFrame implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • rowField

          javax.swing.JTextField rowField
          JTextField for inputting the number of rows.

        • colField

          javax.swing.JTextField colField
          JTextField for inputting the number of columns.

        • iterationField

          javax.swing.JTextField iterationField
          JTextField for inputting the number of iterations.

        • submitButton

          javax.swing.JButton submitButton
          JButton for submitting all inputs. Take note that pressing "Enter" also works.

        • textFields

          javax.swing.JPanel textFields
          JPanel for holding the rowField, colField, and iterationField JTextFields, and also the outputList JComboBox.

        • outputList

          javax.swing.JComboBox<E> outputList
          JComboBox for the different output styles: 0. Display in new window and terminal 1. Display in new window only 2. Display in terminal only

        • outputOptions

          java.lang.String[] outputOptions

    • Class SimulationFrame extends javax.swing.JFrame implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • earth

          Earth earth
          Earth object used for simulation.

        • turn

          javax.swing.JLabel turn
          JLabel for displaying the current turn, or when window display is turned off, simulation status of the terminal is shown.

        • grid

          javax.swing.JPanel grid
          JPanel for holding the grid.

        • turnNum

          int turnNum
          Used for storing the current turn.

        • updater

          SimulationFrame.Updater updater
          ActionListener for updating the grid and turn number. Used with a timer to update every 500 milliseconds

        • timer

          javax.swing.Timer timer
          Timer for scheduling updates every 500 milliseconds.

        • rows

          int rows
          Stores the number of rows in the simulation.

        • cols

          int cols
          Stores the number of columns in the simulation.

        • iterations

          int iterations
          Stores the numbers of iterations in the simulation.

        • outputStyle

          int outputStyle
          Stores the output style retrieve from the outputList in LifeFrame class. 0. Display in new window and terminal 1. Display in new window only 2. Display in terminal only
